Getting started
===============

Install
-------

.. code-block:: console

   $ pip install dataguy

Usage in three lines
--------------------

.. code-block:: python

   >>> from dataguy import DataGuy
   >>> dg = DataGuy([{"a": 1, "b": 2}])
   >>> dg.summary()
   ...

What next?
----------

* Browse the :doc:`API reference <api/index>`.
* See the Jupyter notebook examples in the *examples/* folder.
